title: Sarah Jessica Parker wows in a plunging velvet jumpsuit at star-studded Intimissimi show in Verona
text:
Sarah Jessica Parker looked sensational as she attended the star-studded Intimissimi show in Verona, Italy, on Tuesday night.

The Sex And The City star, 54, joined the likes of supermodel Irina Shayk at the intimate fashion event.

Sarah, who has done several campaigns with Intimissimi, looked incredible as she showcased her svelte frame in a plunging black velvet jumpsuit with sheer arms and a silk waist belt.

Wow: Sarah Jessica Parker looked sensational as she attended the star-studded Intimissimi show in Verona, Italy, on Tuesday night

Staying true to her Carrie Bradshaw persona, the actress made a bold style statement with her footwear as she opted for diamanté heeled brogues.

Sarah further accessorised her ensemble with a matching sparkly handbag and diamond pendant earrings.

The Hocus Pocus star styled her blonde locks into a sleek wavy blow-dried hairdo, she added a slick of glamorous make-up which included pink lipgloss and smoky eye shadow.

Sarah was joined at the event by supermodel Irina, who became the face of Intimissimi in 2007.

Star-studded: The Sex And The City star, 54, who has done several campaigns with Intimissimi, joined the likes of supermodel Irina Shayk at the intimate fashion event

Work it: Sarah looked incredible as she showcased her svelte frame in a plunging black velvet jumpsuit with sheer arms and a silk waist belt

Bling: Sarah further accessorised her ensemble with a matching sparkly handbag and diamond pendant earrings

Irina wowed in a sheer black sequinned shirt mini dress with a pair of high-waisted pants and bra underneath.

The model cinched in her tiny waist with silver buckle black belt, which made a bold fashion statement.

Irina accessorised her look with thigh-high black heeled boots and a small white leather clutch bag.

She styled her brunette locks into a sleek sweptback hairdo, she added a slick of glamorous make-up.

Gorgeous gals: The Hocus Pocus star was joined at the event by supermodel Irina Shayk, who became the face of Intimissimi in 2007 (L-R)

Work it: Sarah styled her blonde locks into a sleek wavy blow-dried hairdo, she added a slick of glamorous make-up which included pink lipgloss and smoky eye shadow (pictured with Irina, left, and Chiara Ferragni, right)

Sarah's appearance comes after it was reported that Disney+ is planning a sequel to the 1993 Disney classic Hocus Pocus, although the main stars are not yet on board.

A new report from Collider claimed that Workaholics writer-producer Jen D'Angelo has come aboard to write the script for the new streaming service.

However, the original Hocus Pocus stars Bette Midler, Sarah and Kathy Najimy are not set to star yet, though Disney 'is hopeful' they come aboard.

The original movie followed a trio of witches - Winifred (Midler), Sarah (Parker) and Mary (Najimy) who have been cursed since 1693 in Salem, Massachusetts.

Exciting: Sarah's appearance comes after it was reported that Disney+ is planning a sequel to the 1993 Disney classic Hocus Pocus, although the main stars are not yet on board (pictured with Chiara)

FROW: Irina wowed in a sheer black sequinned shirt mini dress with a pair of high-waisted pants and bra underneath

Statement: The model cinched in her tiny waist with silver buckle black belt, which made a bold fashion statement, she added a pair of racy thigh-high heel boots

The witches become mysteriously awakened by a young boy Max (Omri Katz) who has moved to Salem from Los Angeles and is trying to impress a girl, Allison (Vinessa Shaw).

Now resurrected 300 years later, the witches resume their plan to suck the souls out of all the children of Salem, starting with Max's younger sister Dani (Thora Birch).

The movie wasn't a box office hit by any means, earning $39 million on a $28 million budget, but it became a cult classic soon thereafter.

Yay: A new report from Collider claimed that Workaholics writer-producer Jen D'Angelo has come aboard to write the Hocus Pocus script for the new streaming service

No plans yet: However, the original Hocus Pocus stars Bette Midler, Sarah and Kathy Najimy are not set to star yet, though Disney 'is hopeful' they come aboard

Plot: The original movie followed a trio of witches - Winifred (Midler), Sarah (Parker) and Mary (Najimy) who have been cursed since 1693 in Salem, Massachusetts (pictured in the 1993 classic)

The film had strong DVD sales and annual Halloween viewings on ABC and The Disney Channel before airing as part of ABC Family's 13 Nights of Halloween.

While it remains to be seen if Middler, Parker and Najimy will reunite for the sequel, they did come together for The Hocus Pocus 25th Anniversary Halloween Bash which aired on Freeform in October 2018.

Neither Middler, Parker, nor Najimy have spoken publicly about this new sequel at this time, and it isn't clear if they ultimately will.
